SELECT R.RESV_NO, R.RESV_DATE || ' ' || R.RESV_TIME AS RESV_DATETIME, B.BABY_NAME, B.BABY_REGNO1, R.RESV_STATUS, B.BABY_NO FROM RESERVATION R, BABY B WHERE R.BABY_NO = B.BABY_NO AND TO_CHAR(R.RESV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND R.RESV_STATUS = 'Y'
AND R.RESV_STATUS != 'Y'
ORDER BY RESV_NO,RESV_DATE
